title: League Sound Breaking up
body:
So after a game or two the sound starts breaking up like its delayed or something and its not just in league but with anything on my monitor either youtube or song or anything, just to prevent you from asking yes the client is the issue 100%
i just started a full repair to see if this gets resolved 
did anyone else come across with this problem, is there a fix??
thank you

replies.body:
If the sound is breaking up on youtube and other services, how is the client the sole cause of the issue?  It sounds like there could be a hardware or driver problem causing this.  My suggestion would be to check your brand's site to see if your driver is up to.

If the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our tech team can help!  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to the ticket, and we'll see you there.

see i knew i'd get a response like this one thats why i put a clarification, YES THE CLIENT IS 1000001% the sole cause of the issue
and the reason im so sure about it its because it only happens when i open the client mostly after 1 game and it stops 2 minutes after i close the client, anyway its like a "sound packet loss" sort of delayed idk its breaking up like mors code
